ComicInfo.Summary:
Nuclear Spring: Planetary begins investigating an innovative bomb maker who disappeared in an explosion during the 1960s.
Burning the Candle at Both Ends: In the wake of last issue's hurricane, Fairchild, Grunge and Burnout are off searching for the missing Roxy and Sarah but instead find a giant toddler under a pile of rubble. He turns out to be Dr. Gideon Spunctry, a scientist who has used meta-genetics to reverse his aging process but with unexpected side effects. The kids help the doctor attempt to counter his rapid march to infancy.
ComicInfo.Title: Nuclear Spring; Burning the Candle at Both Ends
